report_title: KJET Homa Bay County Application Ranking and Evaluation

applications.applicant_name: NDHIWA SUB COUNTY DAIRY FARMERS COOPERATIVE SOCIETY LIMITED

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Coop, Registered since 2003 (>3 yrs), established governance.

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover KES 15M (2024), positive 2-yr trend, strong financial health (T>10M).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Active contracts (schools, hospitals), consistent multi-channel sales, good reputation.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Detailed plan for solar-powered milk coolers and AI services, quantified targets (spoilage reduction, volume increase).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy), critical node (aggregation/chilling), strong farmer linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: 45% women/55% youth participation, solar coolers, biogas digesters, AI for breeding.

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: PLC, Registered since 2014 (>3 yrs), strong track record.

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover KES 25.5M (2024), positive 2-yr trend, strong financial health (T>10M).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Active tenders and subcontracts with major firms (B2B 80%), strong market position.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Detailed plan for BIM software and specialized equipment, quantified targets (20% efficiency, new market penetration).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Construction), critical node (green building/specialized services).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Moderate inclusion (30% women/youth), adopted Green Building and Construction practices.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent retail sales, online presence, contract evidence (20% sales).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan for dedicated Oil Pressing Unit, quantified targets (50% oil production increase), detailed execution plan.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Edible Oils), critical processing node (peanut butter/oil), strong farmer linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Woman-owned (70% ownership), planning solar/energy-efficient systems, local sourcing.

applications.applicant_name: RANGWE DAIRY FARMERS COOPERATIVE SOCIETY LIMITED

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Coop, Registered since 2007 (>3 yrs), functioning governance.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Bulk sales to processors (80%), consistent B2B.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan for Solar Chilling Tank, quantified targets (reduce spoilage by 15%), addressing power issues.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy), critical node (aggregation/chilling), strong linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: 30% women in leadership, smart agriculture practices, resistant trees/fodder species.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent local B2C/B2B (70%/30%) sales, good market share.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan for CNC Router and specialized joinery tools, targets (40% capacity increase, 20% waste reduction).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Construction - furniture/woodwork), clear manufacturing node.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Moderate inclusion (30% women), sustainable sourcing (certified wood), waste recycling (sawdust).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: MSME Association, Registered in 2023 (<1 yr), basic structure.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear need for modern equipment (Embroidery, Knitting, etc.), targets (50% output increase).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Textiles), clear manufacturing node (garment manufacturing).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Woman-owned (85% membership), eco-friendly fabrics, solar panel workshops, local sourcing.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan for Oil Pressing Unit and advanced milling machinery, targets (40% capacity increase, 30% revenue).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Edible Oils), clear processing node, some linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong youth participation (55% youth), waste use/reuse (bran to feed), climate-smart agriculture.

applications.reason: The primary economic activity is **Livestock/Dairy Farming (Goat Farming/Breeding)**, which is explicitly excluded from the KJET Priority Dairy Value Chain.
